title: Gordie’s Journey
description: For years, he’d been a happily married, straight cis male moose masseuse. But then, in a Calgary minute, everything changed. It’s about time for Gordie to make his true sеxual identity appear. Like in a magic trick, for example.
quote: You’re quitting your job to be a magician? You sound loony! And I’m not referring to our nation’s currency.
altHero: Gordie, a basic white guy, walking by a magic shop
alt1: Gordie giving a moose a massage
alt2: Gordie having a diner milkshake with his wife, who looks angry
alt3: Gordie is naked save for a bowtie and tophat covering his privates, various hands reaching out to touch him
alt4: a Dr. Strange-looking magician talks with Gordie
